Performance Notes
After performed in London at Covent Garden

Publication Data
No print edition was found that was published during the period

Adaptation Notes
  • The play is set at the time of the Viking incursions in Scotland, and the plot revolves around the unexpected return of Douglas, the long-lost son of Lady Randolph conceived during a previous but clandestine marriage to Lord Douglas, of which her second husband is unaware.
    • Source: 'Theatre Outside London, 1660-1775'

Adaptation Claims
  • It is evident the text is an adaptation from its title
